data.convo: Is it all right for me to come in now . Mr . Sutcliffe ? Well ... I'm pretty busy . but ... all right . come in . What can I do for you ? Do you mind if I sit down ? Not at all . Take a seat . Now , what can I do for you ? I want to leave the department . Do you think I could put in for a transfer ? Yes , but why should you want to do that ? Do you mind if I speak frankly ? Not at all . Go ahead . Well , you see . I don't like the office . I don't like the staff and I'm afraid you and I don't get on . So may I put in for a transfer ? Yes . I'd delighted if you did .
